meanings.definition: Having actual being; present and real.
meanings.sent1: The tree outside my window is existent.
meanings.sent2: The sun is an existent object in our solar system.
meanings.sent3: I found an existent unicorn in my dream last night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as existent as a rainbow after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The existent stars twinkled in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the existent in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: An interesting fact about existents is their diversity.
meanings.sent3: The existent in the room turned out to be a surprise guest.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted the existent with great detail.
meanings.sent5: The existent in the story played a crucial role in the plot.
